description: A visual discovery and bookmarking platform where users can find and share ideas through images, GIFs, and videos.
A social media platform centered around sharing photos and videos, with features like Stories, Reels, and IGTV for creative expression.
A short-form video sharing platform popular for its wide range of user-generated content, including dance, comedy, and educational clips.
A social networking site where users can connect with friends, share updates, photos, and join groups for common interests.
